languages.text: "Неуловимое презрение", злосчастный пиратский корабль, замечен вновь! Пираты остановились на ремонт в системе Молчание Мер-Сегрит — настал момент избавить Простор от преступников, предавших заветы Императора!

The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!
languages.original_text: "Неуловимое презрение", злосчастный пиратский корабль, замечен вновь! Пираты остановились на ремонт в системе Молчание Мер-Сегрит — настал момент избавить Простор от преступников, предавших заветы Императора!

traits.locale_text: The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

languages.text: 可怕的海盗船“诡秘蔑视号”再次出现了！那群海盗目前停留在梅赛格里特之默，进行舰船维修。是时候惩罚这些违背帝皇信条的罪犯，让他们从科罗努斯扩区彻底消失了！
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

traits.locale_text: 可怕的海盗船“诡秘蔑视号”再次出现了！那群海盗目前停留在梅赛格里特之默，进行舰船维修。是时候惩罚这些违背帝皇信条的罪犯，让他们从科罗努斯扩区彻底消失了！

languages.text: Le vaisseau amiral des pirates, l'Insaisissable Avanie, a de nouveau été repéré ! Cette fois, la bande s'est arrêtée dans le Silence de Mer-Segrit pour effectuer quelques réparations sur sa flotte. L'heure est venue de débarrasser les Étendues de ces criminels qui ont bafoué les principes même de l'Empereur !
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau amiral des pirates, l'Insaisissable Avanie, a de nouveau été repéré ! Cette fois, la bande s'est arrêtée dans le Silence de Mer-Segrit pour effectuer quelques réparations sur sa flotte. L'heure est venue de débarrasser les Étendues de ces criminels qui ont bafoué les principes même de l'Empereur !

languages.text: ¡La temible nave pirata, el Odio Escurridizo, vuelve a dejarse ver! Los piratas han atracado para repararla en el Silencio de Mer-Segrit. ¡Es hora de librar la Extensión de estos criminales que han traicionado los mandamientos del Emperador!
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

traits.locale_text: ¡La temible nave pirata, el Odio Escurridizo, vuelve a dejarse ver! Los piratas han atracado para repararla en el Silencio de Mer-Segrit. ¡Es hora de librar la Extensión de estos criminales que han traicionado los mandamientos del Emperador!

languages.text: 恐ろしい海賊船、エルーシブ・コンテンプト号が再び発見された！海賊たちは修理のためにメル・セグリットの沈黙で停船している。皇帝の教義を裏切った犯罪者どもをエクスパンスから排除する時が来た！
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

traits.locale_text: 恐ろしい海賊船、エルーシブ・コンテンプト号が再び発見された！海賊たちは修理のためにメル・セグリットの沈黙で停船している。皇帝の教義を裏切った犯罪者どもをエクスパンスから排除する時が来た！

languages.text: Die Flüchtige Verachtung wurde wieder gesichtet, das grauenhafte Piratenschiff! Die Piraten haben in der Stille von Mer-Segrit angehalten, um Reparaturen vorzunehmen. Es ist an der Zeit, die Ausdehnung von diesen Verbrechern zu befreien, die die Grundsätze des Imperators verraten haben!
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!

traits.locale_text: Die Flüchtige Verachtung wurde wieder gesichtert, das grauenhafte Piratenschiff! Die Piraten haben in der Stille von Mer-Segrit angehalten, um Reparaturen vorzunehmen. Es ist an der Zeit, die Ausdehnung von diesen Verbrechern zu befreien, die die Grundsätze des Imperators verraten haben!

languages.text: Korkulan korsan gemisi Kaçkın Kibir, bir kez daha görüldü! Korsanlar, onarım amacıyla Mer-Segrit'in Sessizliği'nde durmuş. Enginlik'i İmparator'un ilkelerine ihanet eden bu suçlulardan temelli olarak temizleme zamanı!
languages.original_text: The Elusive Contempt, the dread pirate ship, has been spotted once again! The pirates have stopped for repairs in the Silence of Mer-Segrit — the time has come to rid the Expanse of these criminals who have betrayed the Emperor's tenets!
